import{useState}from"react";import Header from'./components/Header';import Tasks from'./components/Tasks';import AddTask from"./components/AddTask";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[showAddTask,setShowAddTask]=useState(false);const[tasks,setTasks]=useState([{id:1,text:'Doctors Appointment',day:'Feb 5th at 2:30pm',reminder:true},{id:2,text:'Meeting at school',day:'Feb 5th at 2:30pm',reminder:true},{id:3,text:'Food Shopping',day:'Feb 5th at 2:30pm',reminder:false}]);// add task
const addTask=task=>{const id=Math.floor(Math.random()*1000)+1;const newTask={id,...task};setTasks([...tasks,newTask]);};// delete task
const deleteTask=id=>{setTasks(tasks.filter(task=>{return task.id!==id;}));};//toggle reminder
